attributes.action: abide by the decision of the parole board and order the release of Mr R Biggs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At 79 years old and in failing health, is it justifyable to keep a harmless old man in prison until he dies.
Unlike many prisoners released early this man posses society no threat and he's greatest crime over the last 30 or so years has been to constantly embarass our "ruling classes" and in my view is now a "political prisoner" of the state.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
